definition: to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
Madeleine Albright (1937-), former US Secretary of State

sentences.english: I would have introduced Wright-Phillips and Robben a lot earlier.
sentences.chinese: 要是我，就早些换上罗本和小赖特。

sentences.english: Wrighty ran to the new North Bank Stand and embraced the fans in the front row.
sentences.chinese: 赖特跑到了新的北看台，和前面的球迷拥抱。

sentences.english: Wilbur and Orville Wright had 4 wanted to fly.
sentences.chinese: 威尔伯和奥维尔赖特有4要飞。

sentences.english: Fallingwater is Wright designed for the Kafu Man family villa.
sentences.chinese: 流水别墅是赖特为卡夫曼家族设计的别墅。

sentences.english: It was on one of these occasions that I met the Cartwrights.
sentences.chinese: 就是在一次这样的场合，我遇到了卡特赖特一家。

sentences.english: Boyle doesn’t pay much attention to the concentrated effort that Wright put into his work.
sentences.chinese: 博伊尔没有把过多的精力集中在赖特的艺术作品上面。

sentences.english: Credit to Wrighty, they were unbelievable goals.
sentences.chinese: 说到赖特的入球，都是不可思议的入球。

sentences.english: Why associate myself with Reverend Wright in the first place, they may ask?
sentences.chinese: 他们可能会问，为什么你会在一开始同赖特牧师交往？

sentences.english: At 11:30, he swung off his bunk and stepped into a puddle.
sentences.chinese: 11点半，赖特摇摇晃晃地下床，一脚踩进了水坑里。

sentences.english: Tadashi doesn’t hide the fact that his view of Wright is limited.
sentences.chinese: 佐藤不想掩盖他对赖特所知有限这一事实。

sentences.english: He got full of gin and laid round Wright's poolroom all day.
sentences.chinese: 他灌了一肚子杜松子酒，在赖特台球室躺了一天。

sentences.english: Spiral-shaped museum, is Wright's proud of the pen.
sentences.chinese: 螺旋形的博物馆，是赖特的得意之笔。

sentences.english: You will also want to visit the Wheelwright Museum of The American Indian.
sentences.chinese: 你也会想要参观美国印第安人惠赖特博物馆。

sentences.english: "I don't have to work as hard for people to come, " Braitman said.
sentences.chinese: “我没有工作，为人民来之不易，”布赖特曼说。

sentences.english: Wright and Savana took turns lending him their vests.
sentences.chinese: 赖特和萨瓦那轮流把救生衣借给盖伊穿。

definition: Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
